website_summaries.verdict: A quality multi-tool that is well made, but we feel that a few design concerns make others on our list a better choice.
pros: Offers 27 components, including 4 screwdrivers and 2 saws
At around 4 inches long and less than 6 ounces, it's an easy multitool to carry anywhere
cons: Some redundant tools, such as the numerous wire components
Highly polished handle can be slippery

customer_reviews.title: No Knife? Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that a multi-tool like this didn’t have a knife in it. If this is a camping tool a knife is essential to the kit and this product does not have one. Not very thought out when designing a tool for $100 and you can’t even put in a simple blade. Who needs three different types of saws but no knife?? Really wish Victorinox comes up with a better design in the future cause after a design flaw like this I will only be going forward with Leatherman Products going forward with multitool products for camping and daily use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Quality, quality, quality!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best multi-tools out there. I have a bunch of leathermans, but the quality and fit and finish on the Victorinox SwissTool is by far superior. Alas this doesn't get as much pocket time as my leathermans. Why? It's a fingerprint magnet and it drives me nuts. If they'd put a matte finish on this bad boy and added a pocket clip, my leathermans would be collecting dust. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: I had a Leatherman for many years. This is much better. I can't count how many times my fingers were pinched by the tools on the Leatherman. This design is much, much better. Plus the whole look and feel of the Spirit oozes quality and strength. The odd shape of the razor-sharp main knife blade will take a little getting used to, but the reamer will do the job of poking a hole. Very happy with the Spirit, I've used it many times already. The lock-release function works flawlessly and is very easy to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Fellrunner

customer_reviews.title: A great multitool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, high quality multi-tool. It (swisstool spirit) fits in the hand better (more ergonomic) than the swisstool. I use the scissors, knife, pliers, wire strippers and screwdrivers a lot, the file chisel and metal saw less often and I seldom use the wood saw but when I have it worked really well. I carry it around all the time. If you don't have seat belt cutters in your car you might want the serrated blade version (or for some other reason) but a regular drop point blade version also exists. It doesn't rust, the mechanisms are smooth and reliable, and the tools work well. Not heavy. Convenient if you carry it around all the time.
customer_reviews.author: GUILLERMO NERY-GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: How did I not have one of these for so long?
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these after never owning a multi-tool because I was skeptical of their quality & usefulness. I traveled recently with a friend who uses them, and he told me this was the best one. After much research, I determined that the Spirit would be the best choice for me. I now carry it on my belt daily & use it many times a day. I can't believe I went without one for so long! Victronox's example is beautiful, ergonomic, and a real pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: climberevan

customer_reviews.title: An amazing tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago and I'm using it on a weekly bases. I never had a better tool than this one. Also, most of the people I know how owne a similar tool like leatherman had had to replace the main blade or had to deal with cracks. In this regard Victorinox out did them all the tool is as strong today as it was six years ago when I bought it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome multitool
customer_reviews.text: There are mutlitools, great multitools, and then this. This, is a thing of beauty. Locks are very solid, giving it a real nice feel. I'd describe it as "classy". I have a multitool at work on me all the time but this good lookin' tool is on my belt at home and anywhere else. You pay for what you get with this and I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one day if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Use at work everyday for over two years now! I am an hvacr tech! It's my most used tool and has survived the serious abuse I gave it! I also own leather man wave and charge which are great too but I carry the wave on me when I'm not working ! I like variety! So bottom line is this tool has been tested and I would recommend for anyone looking for a reliable strong tool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best EDC multi tool out there, or at least one of the best.
customer_reviews.text: The best EDC multi tool out there, or at least one of the best.Victorinox is well known and respected for making high quality multi tools for different users. I was looking for a perfect pocket sized multi tool and the Victorinox SwissTool Spirit is it! The excellent SwissTool Spirit is very good for the bulk and weight too. And backed by one of the best warranties in the business. After 4 years of EDC use and abuse, it's still like new.
customer_reviews.author: El Caco

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine! Feels very sturdy and comfortable in my hand
customer_reviews.text: Actually used the tiny flat head screwdriver on a pair of glasses. Worked just fine! Feels very sturdy and comfortable in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: ca Bob

customer_reviews.title: Most Useful Multi-Tool
customer_reviews.text: I carry this with me almost every where I go and have always found all the tools useful. The steel is built with such great quality and the blades are very very sharp and always come in handy for day to day use. The screwdrivers are my favorite because they always come in handy with things I take apart and put together when I move from place to place. The curvature doesn't eat into your hand when you use the heavy duty pliers. Really really smooth built. I would buy this as a gift for any of my adventure buddies. Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bui

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of Swiss Tool multi pliers, and I'm sold on them! the old set has a broken screwdriver but still worked fine otherwise. I use the pliers or one of the tools on a daily basis and carry them 6 out of 7 days of the week!
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Surgeon's Tool
customer_reviews.text: Intelligent design, robust function, and flawless finish make this the most refined multi tool I have ever owned. Each polished blade and tool glides open and then locks into place with a satisfying "snick," staying locked in place until released. Cutting tools are razor sharp. If you are looking for a high quality multi-tool, but have been left nonplused by the clunky design and shoddy workmanship of other brands, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multitool!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and comfortable to use. The handle is thick enough and has curved edges so the pliers don't cut into your hands unlike some other brands. Pouch is durable leather with a hearty belt slot and Velcro closure. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: I have an older version of the same model with a straight blade that I Love. Still
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons. Not thrilled about the serrated main blade. I have an older version of the same model with a straight blade that I Love. Still, it's a good multi-tool. Nice quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Tonkin

customer_reviews.title: Masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, quality is top notch, every surface is polished like mirror, every piece of tool locks firmly with no play, and sprint back with a click. I used to like leatherman wave but this multitool surpass leatherman in every way. Leatherman wave's knife, saw all have some play after locked, and not nearly as refined. Even the swisstool leather sheath is way better than leatherman's.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: I Am Not Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the first multi-tool I have owned. I spent considerable time researching different brands and models before settling on this one. I am not disappointed. I am very impressed with the quality of construction and the overall design. In my opinion, I would not purchase this without the leather case. It looks great and securely houses the tool. Believe me when I tell you the knife is sharp. My thumb is all healed now. I would recommend this tool to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best multitool
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best multitool I ever owned. It is well built and the tool locking mechanisms is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Hus7884

customer_reviews.title: A great multi tool
customer_reviews.text: I lost my other Victorniox multi tool. I did not hesitate to get another one. The newer one has a serrated large blade and man let me tell you it will cut. I would recommend this multi tool over others I have purchased along the way. All the others are stashed somewhere but I carry the Victorniox always.
customer_reviews.author: DOM

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Made
customer_reviews.text: In a world of Chinese made garbage, it's hard to find quality. Sadly even Oregon's own Leatherman is now farmed out to the cheap tiny fingers in China (BOO!) This is Swiss made, quality apparent, and clearly for the long haul. One each in my car survival bags.
customer_reviews.author: BCSAlaska

customer_reviews.title: Best multifunction tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one I lost. Seem to use it at least once every day, from tightening loose screws to cutting fingernails. Very well made. Particularly appreciate that all the tools are on the outside, accessible without unfolding the pliers. The locking feature is effective and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin E. Halasz

customer_reviews.title: The brown leather pouch that comes with it is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very solidly built yet lightweight multi-tool. I keep it in my "get out of Dodge" bag, but have found occasion to pull it out of the bag and use it for various chores around the house. The brown leather pouch that comes with it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: therealjesman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality tool. Beats the heck out of my old Leatherman. Blade and tool locks are much more positive, and easier to release. than my old tool. I also like the way it just seems to feel more comfortable , maybe it is the contoured design. Also comes with a very nice leather belt pouch.
customer_reviews.author: smackey02

customer_reviews.title: I Got Spirit . . . .
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I was disappointed because it was smaller than the one's I had seen my friends use (I didn't know there where different size option), but having used it and carried it around, it does everything I need. It looks good and is well made, of course, and fits easily in my backpack side pouch. I may get the larger one down the road to carry in my car, but I'm glad I have this one.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Mahlow

customer_reviews.title: Better version of the Swisstool
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Swisstool Spirit as a backup for my Swisstool. After handling and using the Spirit, I decided I like it more. Both have nearly the same tools, with the Spirit having a partially serrated blade and scissors instead of the plain blade and serrated blade of the swisstool. I find the handle comfortable and the tools functional. I probably will never use some of the tools, but the ones I do use (screwdrivers, saw, file, scissors, can opener, pliers) work well. Complaints: -Scissors are very small. Big enough for string, but too small for serious cutting (fabric, etc). -Heavy ("sturdy" :P ) -The leather sheath cannot be mounted sideways. Overall I am very happy with the Swisstool Spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z

customer_reviews.title: A well kept secret for those who use multi-tools daily
customer_reviews.text: This is a secret well kept from Leatherman users. A great, well made, tool for those who really use multi-tools every day. Great for basic electrical work and for people with rather small hands. The handle is much kinder to the hands than many competitors and the blade lock mechanism is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Jared C. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong w/ this multitool
customer_reviews.text: Victronix (Swiss Army) is the standard in the industry, that all other manufacturers try to reach. You will not be disappointed w/ this unit. SOG, Gerber, Schrade, & Coleman make comperable tools, so buy one of each, & make your own decision, but know that you can't go wrong w/ Victronix.
customer_reviews.author: panther792012

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for to do any job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Dad and he has been using it for more than an year now. He just loves it and cannot leave home without it. This tool might have been used more than 100 times in last one year and has never disappointed. And it still look as though it was bought yesterday. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several over the years if I would only stop donating them to Airport Security!
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, great quality. I use it almost everyday around the house. There is always something to do that is easier with a handy tool by your side.
customer_reviews.author: zugvogel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: A quality tool! My boyfriend adores this and uses it all the time. I really like that there is a lifetime guarantee on parts...that's the reason I purchased this, his last one got bent and wouldn't work correctly. It's a very heavy duty tool that can handle a lot of work!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Petray

customer_reviews.title: Best Multi Tool I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool I've ever owned. I've owned quite a few too. I wanted something that had a phillips head, knife, and pliers mostly but it also needed to be low weight and low profile to carry in my pocket for work. It is perfect. The weight and size are just right. The tool feels very sturdy and well made. Every tool locks in place so they won't slip and close on you. This will be the last multi tool will ever need. Can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Strickland

customer_reviews.title: I got what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected a finest quality utility knife and thats exactly what i got. Shape and weight are sweet, both perfectly balanced. The tools seem heavy duty and the security system makes you feel very confident when using them. Also I must say the pouch is great, the brown leader makes a perfect match with the knifes color. The only con i see is that the leader needle doesn't have a hole to insert the cord into the leader, but it isn't a reason to doubt in getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos P.D.

customer_reviews.title: Leathermans rust. This doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a multipurpose tool when out sailing. It has a bunch of useful tools, and is well engineered. But best of all, it doesn't rust, unlike all the leathermans I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for outdoors person
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and the person loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Verdi

customer_reviews.title: Durable, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these now. You can't beat Swiss army quality. I did break the phillips though (lets just say I was using a bit to much torque). Went to Victorinox website, downloaded their return/fix form, about two weeks later, they shipped me a brand new tool. Great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Massey

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this multi tool,it works for so well for me.in the trees or just tinkering in the garage.its the perfect wook or hobbie tool. the quilty of this tool is unmatched.ive owned other pocket tools and they were never this good.i recomend this to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool. Great quality as can be expected. Better finish and feel as my leatherman.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Van Schalkwyk

customer_reviews.title: Work companion
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox quality, what else can I say? I carry it everyday on my belt on its very nice leather pouch. It does the job when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Marley

customer_reviews.title: Have several if these. Have owned gerber, leatherman ...
customer_reviews.text: Have several if these. Have owned gerber, leatherman and several others. This has never failed. Never broken a blade, Keeps the sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: Myron

customer_reviews.title: No pen knife, that's fine!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this tool! At first I thought that I'd have to still carry a pocket knife w/ me since this doesn't come with a traditional pen knife, but I was wrong. The knife that is in this tool is very sharp, cuts well and does about anything a regular pen knife does. Very good quality. The only down size I have found is that it is a bit on the heavy size.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.text: This multi-tool is amazing, I've already have used every tool in it to cutting thick stubborn rope, opening cans, cutting wires, etc. I keep this in my canvas bag just in case I need for any kind of job. I'm happy with it indeed.
customer_reviews.author: SAWer57

customer_reviews.title: Love the tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the tool; unfortunately, needs a better clasp than velcro on the pouch. Had it one week and lost it in the river.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Holmes

customer_reviews.title: I love this multi tool
customer_reviews.text: Second one I've bought in 10 years. I love this multi tool.
customer_reviews.author: the nuggetman

customer_reviews.title: A worthy replacement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband to replace one he misplaced, it does everything and more that his old one did.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Emmons

customer_reviews.title: This was the most amazing multi tool I'd ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This was the most amazing multi tool I'd ever purchased, sadly I lost it during my Alaska trip... I'm definitely getting another!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with Victorinox!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I started purchasing Victorinox knives I have absolutely enjoyed all their top quality products. This multi-tool is no different. Solid, well-crafted workmanship. The tool is well designed and easy to use. I repair a great deal of computer and electronic equipment and this has been an invaluable piece to carry with me always. I really like that it came with a very nice leather belt pouch. Would recommend this item or any others by Victorinox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, high quality multi tool!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using this ever since I bought it, Its been with me in my EDC day in day out. never left home without it!
customer_reviews.author: dvlferdz

customer_reviews.title: but I think I like this better
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing.... I'm stuck on Leatherman, but I think I like this better.
customer_reviews.author: David Jensen

customer_reviews.title: easy to open and use
customer_reviews.text: I carry these in my car for emergencies while traveling. I grab one from the cars when I need it at home. High quality, easy to open and use.
customer_reviews.author: TJMBEAR

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Durable, just the right tools for everyday use without being to bulky and heavy. The leather holster is great but wish it had a snap instead of a velcro closure which will wear out, and the job I do it will get gummed up with the hydraulic fluids, but when it wears out I will put a snap in it with the leather poker from the tool
customer_reviews.author: steven gordon

customer_reviews.title: Best multi tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 22 year old son as a present. He said it's the best multi-tool that he knows of. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: $55 is great value and makes a great gift to any guy
customer_reviews.text: I already owned a Victorinox SwissTool X and a Spirit. Its size makes it a convenient multi-tool to be carried around anywhere. I waited a few months before Amazon finally dropped its price from $80+. I bought two more Spirit - one for my brother and another for my uncle who just love neat tools. Why? All stainless steel and Swiss made. I just prefer something that is NOT made in China or made in the U.S. but with parts from China.
customer_reviews.author: B. Law

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Leatherman
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality Tool. Very sturdy, well made. A little heavy for pocket carry, but I take it with me everywhere anyway! It's a must have EDC.
customer_reviews.author: G. Workman

customer_reviews.title: One of the best multitools
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox managed to put all the tools together in a compact package. The quality of workmanship is superb compared to my leatherman wave which I also love. It comes with a nice brown leather sheath. I belt carry this tool and it's pretty light that you won't even notice the weight too much. Some people complain about its blade, but I found it useful as I always have a plain edge folder on my pocket. The only downside is you might hesitate to use and abuse it because of its super shiny finish.
customer_reviews.author: tools4real

customer_reviews.title: Best multi tool
customer_reviews.text: I run a handyman and painting service. This has always been on my belt. After I lost my first one I always felt named without it. The fact that every implement has lubricant on it is great. I find lettermans way too stiff and over priced the curve of how the victorinox fits in your hand for plier use is comfortable. And the fact that every function opens and locks out from the closed folder position is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Brush and hammer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and strength. Hope to use it for many ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality and strength. Hope to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: rabble

customer_reviews.title: SwissTool Spirit
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. I mostly use knife, scissors, and file. All of them doing the job pretty good. I would prefer a snap button on the pouch instead of velcro. Otherwise it is good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Timson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best multi tool any person can own. Better than any of my leathermans that I have. Get it you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: James Her

customer_reviews.title: Very solid tool. As good as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items that you look at and really wonder if it is finely engineered and has tight tolerances. It does. I love this thing. I have only once complaint. The velcro on the nice leather pouch felt meh. I would buy this again no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred a pointed blade rather than square blade on the knife. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great tool,just what i need for my Job. Never else go to work without it.
customer_reviews.author: Raúl Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I bought it for camping. Met my expectation. Has the right kind of tools. Very smooth to open.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Tool
customer_reviews.text: I just receieved my multitool, and I'm very impressed. It feels and works great so far. The Leather case is very classy, and the construction is top quality. The description, however, says there is a magnifying glass, straightpin, ruler, key ring, and a ballpoint pen. None of those are in mine. I'm guessing a description got mixed up in the wrong product listing. Despite that, I'm going to enjoy this for years. It's a very very nice multitool. I'd gladly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: mrwarren

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best Mutlitool out there
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Leathermen, Gerber and of course, a Swiss Army Knife, but the Spirit is a much better thought out unit I love the fact that you can access the tools without opening up the whole unit
customer_reviews.author: W. H. Brokob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, he absolutely loves it!! Very high quality tool!
customer_reviews.author: cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool. Feels solid and comfortable in hand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Feels solid and comfortable in hand. Put replacement cutters on it and it's a leather beater any day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends birthday and it has made him very very happy I got to hold it and it is made with very nice quality this is defiantly something that will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: A. McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Excellent Excellent Excellent Excellent Excellent Excellent Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Owesome prodict, owesome very owesome i love. Prefect i very loved very much as expected i really loved owesome owesome
customer_reviews.author: Enepe

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool Ever
customer_reviews.text: This multitool is the best available. All of the tools are great, and do their job well. The knife, while lacking a point, is razr sharp. I carry my tool everywhere, and it hasn't let me down yet!
customer_reviews.author: Libbo

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: i immediately started using it the day it arrived and it is one of the favorite tools like this i have. you can open the tool without expanding out the pliers and the tools lock into place while using them which are the two things i like best.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: A solid multi-tool and it even comes with a leather sheath. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Made To Meet Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute beast! The craftsmanship is wonderful, the feel is solid, and it's one of the best Multi-Tools out there. You definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Backpackers look elsewhere..
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tool. The fit, finish and action are very impressive. It would be perfect for the handyman, tradesman or anyone that doesn't care about bulk or weight. I especially like the locking feature for the tools. Because it's such a nice tool, I plan on keeping it. It will likely last for many years with minimal care. Having said that, it's probably not for the backpackers out there. The pictures don't capture how large and heavy this tool is relative to many other multi-tools and most swiss army knives. So if you're a backpacker who watches every ounce, there are better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Electronics Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SwissTool
customer_reviews.text: Took it to a camping trip and it was very handy, great feel and look. Made with high quality material, and for the price that I got it for ~$40, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacu430

customer_reviews.title: None better
customer_reviews.text: Have used Victorinox products for over 30 years and have never been disappointed. From knives, watches, to luggage, I would recommend them to all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lewis Miller, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality MT
customer_reviews.text: I can only compare this to my old Leatherman PST II. The fit and finish on the Vic is clearly superior, and all of the implements move very smoothly and nautrally to me. It also fits my hand well. I particularly like the wide blade with the wavy edge, which cuts rope and twine quite nicely. It certainly works very well as a camping tool, though I don't use it in my trade often.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality and Best Price
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a Christmas gift to a very high tech "son in law", who appreciates the BEST in tools. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JLS Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Smart tool
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, and not too small. Works very well and comes in handy. I would recommend to others to use. Do miss the regular knife blade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: this tools is all that i wanted it to be, was a present for my father, i liked the most the blade and kind was missing the ruler in the frame, my mistake because there's another model that have it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Quintero

customer_reviews.title: a daily necessity
customer_reviews.text: ...I reach for this tool at least 10 times a day - this is my second Spirit Multi-tool, only because I lost my first one...a must have
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gjeltema

customer_reviews.title: Really Functonal, I carry it every day!
customer_reviews.text: This Multi-Tool can really get you out of trouble, it is really well built and it has just the right tools you may need, I don't leave the house without it as it is a great resource if you are in a pickle, no disappointment here, same old trustworthy Victorinox quality.
customer_reviews.author: agranados777

customer_reviews.title: SwissTool
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a good multitool. I like the way it feels in my hand. It is a bit smaller than Leatherman or SOG tools, but still has all the functions. The smaller size is actually nicer because it is more compact.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I was looking for, something useful that ground always take with me, is an excellent tool and helper!
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, poor quality pouch
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself is great; I had put it to good use on various occasions. The pouch, however, could use some improvement on the velcro which holds the flap close. Six months after carrying daily and using that the tool from time to time, the velcro will no longer keep the flap close securely. The tool had fell out on me on different occasions because the flap had opened up. It is with luck that I still have the tool. I would prefer a pouch with a snap keeping the flap closed.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Victorinox SwissTool Spirit
customer_reviews.text: 100% recommended, the item arrived in a very big box (too big for the product) but with nice protection. Brand new Victorinox SwissTool Spirit with Brown Leather Pouch
customer_reviews.author: Dante Fasano

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an old Swiss Army knife guy. This is more of a tool designed around pliers than a tool designed around a knife. And it's great! We had it engraved with a birthday message and gave it. As a gift to our 18 year old. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: VT Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for the Handy Man In the Family
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my dad for Christmas and he loved it. Almost wished I had bought one for myself. It is a well built tool. Solid and compact.
customer_reviews.author: D-tor

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have love the size and the case. Will recommend to my friend swiss is always great. Needs a blade
customer_reviews.author: ferny

customer_reviews.title: I really love it
customer_reviews.text: except shape of main knife, I like it very much! It is light, stable, fine finish, I bring it everyday
customer_reviews.author: benjaminyu

customer_reviews.title: good to follow it by shipping app
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, shipping quite fast, good to follow it by shipping app.
customer_reviews.author: gepataki

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this, its a Swiss product and is well made and very useful and comes with a nice leather holder.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Swiss know how to make fine tools that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: The best gifts I've ever given.
customer_reviews.text: Having owned one, I thought I'd hand out a couple as gifts this year. I hear constant praise for the product. The price paid could not have been better. They came on the day expected. Carton was crushed when it arrived but both tools were there. I will buy another(this time for me).
customer_reviews.author: Felix Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, I used Gerber before this an the material was a bad in some Pieces like screwdriver, the Swiss tool is better in form, in material, quality, polish style.
customer_reviews.author: ramachandra Diaz Silva

customer_reviews.title: Best multi tool around
customer_reviews.text: Durable, compact, well designed, single must have tool you need to carry to get you out of a jam, don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. But in case you need the knife with sharp edge it isn't available
customer_reviews.author: Kevork Sarafian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Multi-Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multi tool, I don't use it much but has all the functions you need in a multi-tool. Hope I get as much life out of it as my Leatherman. The blades on this are very sharp. Amazingly sharp. Fast shipment. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Bad workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the quality of of this product maybe i'm not fortunate with the one that i got. The plier handle of this swisstool spirit is off center to each other at closed position. I'm not gonna recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit thinking it was the same as the Victorinox Multitool X that I lost. It is a sorry replacement! The scissors suck. The file is not cross- hatched like my old one. And the they switched the pointed blade for a flat nosed serrated one. How stupid? It is alsosmaller, lighter and feels wimpier in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: namvet

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swiss Army Swisstool Spirit with Leather Pouch
product_meta.description:
No tool belt should be without its very own Victorinox Swiss Army SwissTool. The SwissTool was designed for ease of use, but doesn't compromise on durability or functionality. Individual springs hold the tools in place so you can easily access each one individually from the outside of the handle. The lock and release system is designed to lock each tool in place when opened, and release to fold away with a simple slide of the release button.

The SwissTool is truly a handyperson's helper with a multitude of implements and available accessories; it's at your service when it's at your side. From lightweight design to its outside opening implements, there's not much the SwissTool can't do.

Like all Swiss Army Knives, the SwissTool has a lifetime warranty, stainless steel implements and Swiss-made quality and durability. 

Includes 27 Functions:

 1.  Needle Nose Pliers
 2.  Screwdriver (2mm)
 3.  Screwdriver (3mm)
 4.  Wire Cutter (for wire up to 40 hrc)
 5.  Bottle Opener
 6.  Screwdriver (6mm)
 7.  Strong Crate Opener
 8.  Combi-edge Blade
 9.  Scissors
 10. Metal File
 11. Metal Saw
 12. Wood Saw
 13. Reamer
 14. Phillips Screwdriver
 15. Chisel/Scraper
 16. Isolation Length Cutter
 17. Wire Bender
 18. Wire Stripper/Scraper
 19. Round Cutter
 20. Can Opener
 21. Multi-purpose Hook
 22. Leather Pouch
 23. Coupling for Corkscrew
 24. Hard Wire Cutter
 25. Lanyard Hole
 26. Ten Individual Springs
 27. Lock Release

History and Heritage
In 1884, Master Cutler Karl Elsener opened a cutlery shop in Ibach, Switzerland. There, he and the cutlers’ union he formed produced the finest steel cutlery, finished with the now-famous proprietary edge preferred globally by professional and home cooks. In 1891, Karl supplied the Swiss Army with its standard issue Soldier’s Knife and in 1897 with the Officer’s Knife. In 1921, after the death of his mother, Victoria, and with the advent of stainless steel, then known as “inoxydable" and used in the production of his cutlery, Karl changed the name of the company to Victorinox. It is from those humble beginnings that a worldwide icon was born.

Today, Victorinox is still owned and operated by the Elsener family, and both the company and family still resides in the small village of Ibach, Switzerland. 

Care Tips for Swiss Army Knives
The various tools are manufactured from high-quality steel with precisely tuned features that are essential for the particular application. The steel is tempered, annealed and polished to achieve the necessary hardness and provide optimum resistance to corrosion.

Sharpening
To re-sharpen your knife, use a whetstone at an angle of 15°– 20°. This will result in a cutting angle of 30°– 40°. If sharpening on a grinding wheel, always cool with plenty of water to avoid excessive temperatures and the resulting damages that may occur.

Cleaning
After you’ve used your Swiss Army Knife for all of its various applications, such as cutting open numerous boxes, you may notice that the blades begin to stick together. Opening and closing the blades in warm water several times will allow the tools to easily move again. Once they have dried, it is recommended, to apply a small drop of oil between the blade or tool shank and the spring. To optimally maintain the locking mechanism, periodically apply a drop of our recommended Swiss Army Knife Oil. Never put Swiss Army Knives in the dishwasher.



AMAZON.COM
From the renowned company that created the Swiss Army knife a century ago comes the SwissTool Spirit folding multi-tool, a handy tool kit neatly contained within a folding body that measures just 4.13 inches long. The SwissTool Spirit is sheathed in a sleek stainless-steel body that stores comfortably in a leather belt pouch. More importantly, the SwissTool Spirit offers 27 functions, with such mini-tools as needle-nose pliers; 2mm, 3mm, and 6mm screwdrivers; a wire cutter; a bottle opener; a crate opener; a combi-edge blade; scissors; a metal file; a metal saw; a wood saw; a reamer; a Phillips screwdriver; a chisel/scraper; an isolation length cutter; a wire bender; a wire stripper; a wire scraper/round cutter; a can opener; a multipurpose hook; a coupling for a corkscrew; a hardwire cutter; 10 individual springs; and a lock release. 

 As with all Victorinox items, the SwissTool Spirit is made to exacting standards, with dozens of steps going into its construction. Victorinox attends to every detail, from selecting the finest materials to performing the final inspection. In addition, each individual tool has been hardened in a different way to stand up to its designated use. The SwissTool Spirit--which comes with a lanyard hole and a leather pouch--weighs 5.75 ounces and carries a lifetime warranty. 

 



The SwissTool Spirit packs 27 functions into its compact stainless-steel body.  SwissTool Spirit Tools


 * Needle-nose pliers 
 * 2mm screwdriver 
 * 3mm screwdriver 
 * 6mm screwdriver 
 * Wire cutter (for wire up to hardness of 40 hrc) 
 * Bottle opener 
 * Screwdriver 
 * Crate opener 
 * Combi-edge blade 
 * Scissors 
 * Metal file 
 * Metal saw 
 * Wood saw 
 * Reamer 
 * Phillips screwdriver 
 * Chisel/scraper 
 * Isolation length cutter 
 * Wire bender 
 * Wire stripper 
 * Wire scraper/round cutter 
 * Can opener 
 * Multipurpose hook 
 * Coupling for corkscrew 
 * Hard wire cutter 
 * Lanyard hole 
 * 10 individual springs 
 * Lock release 
 * Leather pouch 

 About Victorinox
In 1884, Swiss cutler Karl Elsener set up shop in Ibach-Schwyz, installing a waterwheel in Tobelbach Brook to run his grinding and polishing machines. Thus began what would become the international brand name Victorinox, a combination of Victoria, for Elsener's mother, and "inox," or stainless steel. Today, Victorinox produces watches, luggage, clothing, and, famously, Swiss Army Knives. The original product dates to 1897, when Elsener patented the Swiss Officer's and Sports Knife he supplied to the Swiss Army. Following World War II, American servicemen and women shopping in PX stores shortened the name to Swiss Army Knife, which lives on in English-speaking countries around the world and has become a metaphor for versatility.
feature_bullets: Features 27 robust functions to complete your toolbox including - Needle nose pliers, Phillips screwdriver, leather pouch, and combi-edge blade (See product description for full list of functions)
Stainless steel construction provides lightweight and lasting durability for long term use
Unique design allows you to access each tool individually from the outside of the handle; tools lock into place when opened and fold away with a simple slide of the release button
Made in Switzerland; Victorinox provides a lifetime guarantee against defects in material and workmanship
Folding multi-tool with 27 functions and stainless-steel body
Bottle opener, create opener, combi-edge blade, and scissors
Metal file, metal saw, wood saw, chisel/scraper, and wire stripper
Measures 4.13 inches long; weighs 5.75 ounces; lifetime warranty
